title: Summoner Names
body:
I'm fairly new to League Of Legends but in my small time here I've come across many foul names that shouldn't be allowed but still happen to exist. This is one that I've managed to remind myself to screenshot. I personally am not offended by them as I understand the world of being part of an online community.
Lux {{champion:99}}  for example has a fairly sexual oriented name. They themselves as a player were friendly but their name doesn't quite fit in with Riot's child friendliness 
[REMOVED - No Reporting Other Players]

replies.body: I agree, Riot's toxicity system is absolute garbage

Yes it's sad how people can get away with some pretty toxic summoner names. My friend went against someone the other day whose name literally told us to commit suicide. Riot literally does nothing about it.
